name: Carseats&Coffee
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, what's in the news?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Carseats & Coffee is for the dads of the world. These briefings are short, possibly beneficial, and might be a little sarcastic at times. So dads tell Alexa to volume up, and enjoy these little flash briefings. 

Also be kind to Alexa she is a sweetheart and probably listens to you better than your kids.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
